backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with access control, storage mixins, task data models, comparison helpers, and query methods backed by persistent Map structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for all major frontend React components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app configuring theme, error boundaries, bootstrap, and tabbed navigation for dashboard, tasks, and admin views.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Login-gated screen prompting unauthenticated users to sign in via Internet Identity.
Admin-only dialog for creating tasks with full field set, validation, directory lookup, and form state management.
frontend/src/components/AppBootstrap.tsx: Initializes the authenticated app environment, handling identity, actor setup, profile/admin queries, and displaying appropriate loading or error screens.
frontend/src/components/AppLoadErrorScre: Displays a user-friendly load error screen with retry, reset, and reload options, including reconnecting states.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDetailsT: Shows and allows editing or deleting of a single assignee/captain pair with form controls and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AssigneeDirector: Manages the full assignee/captain directory with add, edit, delete, bulk operations, CSV import/export, and tabbed details views.
frontend/src/components/BulkActionBar.ts: Provides a sticky toolbar for bulk selections with count display, clear button, and optional action controls.
frontend/src/components/BulkEditTasksDia: Offers a dialog to bulk-edit task status and payment status with simple form controls and save handling.
frontend/src/components/BulkUploadSectio: Handles CSV/Excel upload, parses rows, validates fields, and triggers bulk task creation.
frontend/src/components/CategoryManageme: Provides UI to create and list task categories, subcategories, statuses, and payment statuses.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple branded footer with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding, theme toggle, and user account dropdown.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name and email.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Catches runtime errors and shows a fallback screen while logging diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailDialog: Shows a dialog with a task list and multi-tab detailed task viewer with editing support.
frontend/src/components/TaskDetailsTab.t: Displays detailed task information with status, payment data, and edit option for admins.
frontend/src/components/TaskFormDialog.t: Dialog component for creating and editing tasks with form fields, validation, and related query hooks.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Empty file placeholder for user management UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBulkSelection.ts: Provides selection logic for lists including toggling items, selecting all, and tracking checkbox state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for tasks, user profiles, admin checks, and task mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Wraps actor creation with timeout handling, reconnection attempts, and fallback logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useTaskDetailTabs.ts: Manages tab state for opening, updating, and closing task detail tabs.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, variables, themes, and component layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders an admin panel with tabs for bulk upload, category settings, and assignee management.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays charts and task summaries with filters and a detail dialog for drilling into task groups.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Provides task listing with search, filtering, bulk actions, and dialogs for creating, editing, and viewing tasks.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Generates, downloads, and parses assignee CSV files with validation and error collection.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numeric values as US currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics.ts: Logs initialization and runtime events with sensitive data redacted and supports reconnect diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, and features focused on fixing frontend–backend canister ID mismatches.
